name: Jackie Sears
text: I highly recommend using this company for your asphalt needs.  Dustin and his helper are very friendly and professional.  It was obvious to me in only a few minutes of sealcoating my driveway that they take PRIDE in their work and are professional and do everything they can to make sure you are happy with the job.  The price was great and will definitely use them again!!   It's a YES from me!!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the review! We are glad you’re happy with your driveway!

name: Michelle
text: Precision Seal Coating & Striping has been Sealing our driveway for over 10 years. Their price is great & the quality of work is excellent. They keep our  18 year old driveway looking new! They fill in the cracks to help prolong the driveways life.  The owners are very friendly &  100% reliable. They have been in business for over 30 years & receive the top pavement contractor awards for years. They are fully licensed , insured & offer a free estimate.  I highly recommend using this reputable company who does an excellent Job!

name: Margaret Simmons
text: Made our parking lot look new again. He cleaned, filled cracks, applied sealant and re-striped.  Great service with no interruptions in our service because he worked around our business hours.

resp.text: Thank you for the review! We appreciate your business!

name: David Phillips
text: Dustin does quality work!  He is courteous and easy to work with.  He sealed and stripped our church parkinglot. Amazing Grace Baptist Church, 27440 Hwy 431, Wedowee, AL. His prices are very competitive.  I highly recommend Precision Seal Coating.  10/4/19

resp.text: Thank you for the review! We appreciate your business!

name: Nettie Williams
text: We use c&c for our sealer go to it’s the blackest thickest sealer I’ve ever seen thanks guys for selling to me .Jacob edwards.

name: Melody Corley
text: This was bought out and is now C & C ashalt.

name: ujslost
text:
After calling around to other local companies that were to lazy to earn a dollar I found M&S Construction.  They were very professional, polite and communicate professionally with their customers.  THANK YOU FOR THE CHERT DELIVERY!   Will recommend to anyone who asks! NO BS with these people like I got from the others on Sand Mountain.
John Eddings

name: Jay Mallory
text: I've used keith for bout 3 years now I've always got a great job  at a good price.and I will be using  him again.He is hands on .on all parts of the job from start to finish.He will be on my reuse list.

name: KEITH JEWELL Straight-Line PARKING LOT MAINTENANCE
text: Family-run business

name: Tim Whithead
text: Great service at a good price.i will be using again thanks keith great job

name: Rick Trevor
text: If you need some professional work done at a reasonable rate then the company to call on is Truline Parkinglot, Keith Jewell has always given me quality work as his best ability of service.  Rick Trevor

name: Sarah Homer
text: DO NOT HIRE!!!  After begging them multiple times to finish the job, they still never came back.

name: Noblitt Construction
text: Family-owned and operated these boys can handle all your asphalt needs good quality work at a reasonable rate

name: K And W Backhoe Service
text:
If you want a good job for a decent price Keith who has been taken care of all of my asphalt needs for the past 10 years these boys know what they're doing and they're good at it.

K&W
Backhoe service

name: Don Dickerson
text: Keith and his boys has been doing my work for about 6 years now. Take pride in his work he is on time in a timely manner I am very satisfied with his work and performance I will be using him again

name: John Wells
text: I got a great job they were very punctual on time they use a very good product I'm not much on giving reviews and I'm proud to give this one I will be using again I've got two properties that Keith keeps up and their product does uphold and withstand heavy traffic

name: Keith Jewell parking lot maintenance contractor
text: Family run .we try to keep our prices down and keep doing the same quality work

name: Jay Jewell
text: I got a good professional job.we need to support all of our small business they are a dieing bred.

name: Terry Sorrells
text: Keith has been doing my work for about 15 years now I always got a good  job from him at a good price it comes to any of my asphalt or cement work he's my go-to man

resp.text: Thanks Terry we try to meet all asphalt  needs

name: Tom Manning
text: Ive always have had great service from keith jewell and his men.ive got a good job for a great price.

name: John Hatcher
text: Keith been doing my work for a number of years now.ive been very please with his work and will keep using  him

name: James Pal
text: Keith jewell is my go to guy when it comes to my parking  lot.He has been doing my work for 10 years or better.His service is jam up and he takes pride in his work and put the customer  first

name: K And W Backhoe Service
text: These boys do a great job the reasonable on their prices Keith has been handling my asphalt work for the last 10 years and I've always got a jam up job I'm very well satisfied.

name: KEITH JEWELL Straight-Line PARKING LOT MAINTENANCE
text: We try not to contract any of my workout we try to be Hands-On and do it our self Sealcoating & Striping parking lot maintenance. And yes we are a family-run business. We tried to work right here in the Wiregrass with other small business and keep our money and home all in all that has worked out decent. I had one company and it was a local grass company I had mr. Brown go back on the first one I think a total of 3 trips the customer was not happy I ended up having to go in there and redo it our self second one was in Geneva .He made one trip and didn't show back up at all then. But I got another local grass company to take care of it and they will do my work from here on that so please beware if a company ask for a deposit or a draw think twice before you signed that check because they are still a few out there that will take advantage of you.

name: Keith Jewell “Straight-Line lot parking” Straight-Line
text:
We try to keep our prices down with out cutting our sealer or quality of work
.our clients are our life line

name: Jason Finley
text: Great quality work at a descent affordable price we will definetly will be used by me again

name: wayne noblitt
text: Is a family-run business that's something that we do not have a lot of nowadays

name: Brittany Kossow
text: High quality products and customer service!!

name: Larry Miller
text: Pavey.

name: Bob Klein
text:
Edit March 2021.

The job looks good to me I just wonder why the county came and did it again within a few months of it being done the first time. I wonder who’s uncle owned the second company that redid a good job the first time.

This company is doing the roads in my neighborhood.  Nice crew, efficient, good work.  Got in did the prep, got it done.  No issues.
The guys on this crew, did between ashland ave/stefani rd area, did right.

name: Amy Taylor
text: This company has been paving around our area for some time now, with no real issues other than traffic. This morning, as I'm leaving the large truck stop they meet at, I look over to check traffic and as I do, I see one of their employees relieving himself in front of the drivers side door of one of their trucks. Does this person not realize that not only is he relieving himself in public at a large truck stop at the exit, but that he is at a truck stop and he can walk inside and do that!?!?!

name: Steven Penny
text: Horrible company. They dealt with paving roads in Montgomery and my car was damaged from excess rocks. I called after submitting a claim and was told that my claim would most likely get denied because the amount of road debris was in an "acceptable range". I realize that they can't be perfect but there were so many rocks it was impossible to avoid getting hit. I am not exaggerating when I say it was like driving in rain except it was rocks. I would slow down and get in another lane but another car would come along and throw more rock at my car. I eventually got off the highway but not before my window was cracked.  It was the day of or after they ground the old road down and either they or their sub didn't clean up the roads very well. Submitted a claim and never heard back from them.

name: Thomas Lucys
text: THis company one of the best if you need an excellent road.Thanks

name: Alissa Padgett
text: The nicest group of people!

name: Darlene Dees
text: Very nice people working here.

name: Blue Magic
text: Got unloaded with no issues!

name: Oleksandr Burdeinyi
text: Expect 4-5 hours to get loaded

name: Javier Romero
text: Loved it.
